Source: Stats NZ Environmental Indicators: Health impacts of PM<sub>10</sub>
Measure: Modelled health effects from exposure to human-generated PM<sub>10</sub>
Caveat: The number of health effects from exposure to PM<sub>10</sub> were modelled.~The number of cases per 100,000 population for mortality and hospital admissions were rounded to the nearest whole number and restricted activity days to the nearest 100.~Number of cases per 100,000 population were determined using raw unrounded data.~Population estimates are based on estimated resident population data at 30 June of the given year.
Notes: Link to the source data and metadata: https://data.mfe.govt.nz/table/98462-health-impacts-of-pm10-2006-2016/
